mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebayApplication( id, paypalId, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{paypalId}, #{businessName}, #{shopUrl}, #{shopName}, #{applicantName}, #{applicantId}, #{recipientAcc}, #{recipientAccName}, #{recipientId}, #{address}, #{managerName}, #{managerDepartment}, #{managerId}, #{transactionRecordName}, #{applicationFileName}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT id, paypalId, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime FROM ebayapplication WHERE status = #{status} AND auditor = #{auditor}

SELECT id, paypalId, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime FROM ebayapplication WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY uploadTime LIMIT 0, 1
